-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
System.namespace("DCET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("EntityHelper", function (namespace)
    local IsEmptyOrDisposed, ExistAndUndisposed
    IsEmptyOrDisposed = function (component)
      return component == nil or component:getIsDisposed()
    end
    ExistAndUndisposed = function (component)
      return component ~= nil and not component:getIsDisposed()
    end
    return {
      IsEmptyOrDisposed = IsEmptyOrDisposed,
      ExistAndUndisposed = ExistAndUndisposed
    }
  end)
end)
